title: Public Holidays (Declaration) (No. 3) Notice, 2021
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government
Gazette dated Friday, 20th August, 2021 635
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
Statutory Instrument No. 72 of 2021
The Public Holidays Act
(Laws, Volume 15, Cap. 272)
The Public Holidays (Declaration) Notice, 2021
In exercise of the powers contained in section 3 of the Public
Holidays Act, the following Notice is issued:
1. (1) This Notice may be cited as the Public Holidays Title
(Declaration) (No. 3) Notice, 2021.
2. It is declared that 28th April in every year, commencing Declaration
with 28th April, 2022, shall be observed as a public holiday in of public
commemoration of the birthday of the late First Republican holiday
President, Dr. Kenneth David Kaunda.
Edgar C. Lungu,
President
Lusaka
19th August, 2021
[co. 101/9/1]
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K 4.00 each.
636 Statutory Instruments 20th August, 2021
